aws_ssm_maintenance_window_target.description: Provides an SSM Maintenance Window Target resource

window_id.description: The Id of the maintenance window to register the target with.

name.description: The name of the maintenance window target.

description.description: The description of the maintenance window target.

resource_type.description: The type of target being registered with the Maintenance Window. Possible values `INSTANCE`.

targets.description: The targets (either instances or tags). Instances are specified using Key=InstanceIds,Values=InstanceId1,InstanceId2. Tags are specified using Key=tag name,Values=tag value.

owner_information.description: User-provided value that will be included in any CloudWatch events raised while running tasks for these targets in this Maintenance Window.

id.description: The ID of the maintenance window target.
